mapper.delete: delete from PORTFOLIO where (id) in ( (#{ item.id }) )
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`, t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`, t1.`CREATE_MAN`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`DESCRIPTION`, t1.`END_AT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IS_DELETED`, (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) AS `IS_FAVORITE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`START_AT`, t1.`STATE`, t1.`UPDATE_MAN`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `PORTFOLIO` t1

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`, t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`, t1.`CREATE_MAN`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`DESCRIPTION`, t1.`END_AT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IS_DELETED`, (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) AS `IS_FAVORITE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`START_AT`, t1.`STATE`, t1.`UPDATE_MAN`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `PORTFOLIO` t1

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`, t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`, t1.`CREATE_MAN`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`DESCRIPTION`, t1.`END_AT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IS_DELETED`, (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) AS `IS_FAVORITE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`START_AT`, t1.`STATE`, t1.`UPDATE_MAN`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `PORTFOLIO` t1 where EXISTS(SELECT * FROM `PORTFOLIO_MEMBER` t11 WHERE t1.`ID` = t11.`PORTFOLIO_ID` AND ( t11.`USER_ID` = #{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} AND t11.`ROLE_ID` = 'admin' ) )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`, t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`, t1.`CREATE_MAN`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`DESCRIPTION`, t1.`END_AT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IS_DELETED`, (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) AS `IS_FAVORITE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`START_AT`, t1.`STATE`, t1.`UPDATE_MAN`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `PORTFOLIO` t1 where ( t1.`IS_DELETED` = 0 AND not exists(select 1 from `work` t2 where t2.id = t1.id and t2.portfolio_id = #{ctx.webcontext.portfolio}) AND not exists(select 1 from `work` t2 where t1.id = t2.portfolio_id and t2.principal_type = 'project_portfolio') AND t1.`ID` <> #{ctx.webcontext.portfolio} )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`, t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`, t1.`CREATE_MAN`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`DESCRIPTION`, t1.`END_AT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IS_DELETED`, (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) AS `IS_FAVORITE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`START_AT`, t1.`STATE`, t1.`UPDATE_MAN`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `PORTFOLIO` t1 where ( t1.`IS_DELETED` = 0 AND (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) = '1' )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`, t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`, t1.`CREATE_MAN`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`DESCRIPTION`, t1.`END_AT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IS_DELETED`, (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) AS `IS_FAVORITE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`START_AT`, t1.`STATE`, t1.`UPDATE_MAN`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `PORTFOLIO` t1 where ( t1.`IS_DELETED` = 1 )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`, t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`, t1.`CREATE_MAN`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`DESCRIPTION`, t1.`END_AT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IS_DELETED`, (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) AS `IS_FAVORITE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`START_AT`, t1.`STATE`, t1.`UPDATE_MAN`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `PORTFOLIO` t1 where ( t1.`IS_DELETED` = 0 )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`, t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`, t1.`CREATE_MAN`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`DESCRIPTION`, t1.`END_AT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IS_DELETED`, (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) AS `IS_FAVORITE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`START_AT`, t1.`STATE`, t1.`UPDATE_MAN`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `PORTFOLIO` t1 where EXISTS(SELECT * FROM `PORTFOLIO_MEMBER` t11 WHERE t1.`ID` = t11.`PORTFOLIO_ID` AND ( t11.`USER_ID` = #{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} AND t11.`ROLE_ID` = 'reader' ) )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`, t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`, t1.`CREATE_MAN`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`DESCRIPTION`, t1.`END_AT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IS_DELETED`, (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) AS `IS_FAVORITE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`START_AT`, t1.`STATE`, t1.`UPDATE_MAN`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `PORTFOLIO` t1 where EXISTS(SELECT * FROM `PORTFOLIO_MEMBER` t11 WHERE t1.`ID` = t11.`PORTFOLIO_ID` AND ( t11.`USER_ID` = #{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} AND t11.`ROLE_ID` = 'user' ) )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`, t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`, t1.`CREATE_MAN`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`DESCRIPTION`, t1.`END_AT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`IDENTIFIER`, t1.`IS_DELETED`, (select count(1) from favorite where create_man=#{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} and OWNER_ID=t1.`ID` ) AS `IS_FAVORITE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.`START_AT`, t1.`STATE`, t1.`UPDATE_MAN`, t1.`UPDATE_TIME` FROM `PORTFOLIO` t1 where ( exists(select 1 from `work` t2 where t2.principal_id= t1.id and t2.portfolio_id = #{ctx.webcontext.project_portfolio}) AND t1.`IS_DELETED` = 0 )
